descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to craft gold from a gold ingot. You get 25 gold per ingot.
This is just a bit less than what you could sell an ingot for at a vendor. I guess you
up your smithing a bit while getting rid of some of those stolen gold ingots!

Installation:

1.) Extract the contents of the zip file into your Skyrim Directory folder... Or use Nexus Mod Manager
2.) Place this mod above any other mods that add crafting recipes in the
load order!

Compatibility:

This mod should be compatible with anything!
author: Blaze
